question: In which city, the first batch of the UNNATI programme of Indian Space Research Organisation got inaugurated in 2019?
explanation: The full form of UNNATI is Unispace Nanosatellite Assembly and Training Programme. On January 17, 2019, Minister of State in the Department of Space Dr. Jitendra Singh inaugurated the first batch of UNNATI programme of ISRO in Bengaluru, Karnataka.
